synopsis.text:
Educational aspirations and corporate conspiracies collide in the Martian colony of Fourth Tokyo, where the brightest young minds of Kirishina Corporation are striving to push the boundaries of aerospace technology. Led by the prodigious engineer Kaito Sera, the A-TEC classroom eagerly awaits the arrival of a new member, only to discover that their newest addition, Nagisa Kiryuu, has been sent to shut down their program.

Determined to save their classroom, Kaito and his students work tirelessly to create a successor to their most powerful rocket, the X-2, while Nagisa, the younger brother of the corporation's CEO, ascends the corporate ladder in pursuit of his own objectives. As their individual battles unfold, they soon uncover a web of intrigue and political warfare within Kirishina Corporation.

Follow Kaito, Nagisa, Mizuki (Kaito's younger sister), and Iris Shirasaki (A-TEC's test pilot) in a thrilling tale of ambition, romance, and political intrigue. As A-TEC and Nagisa are drawn deeper into the corporation's conspiracies, friendships blossom and hidden pasts come to light as they fight to avert their classroom crisis and secure the future of their Martian colony.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
